import { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [weather, setWeather]= useState([]) const[search, setSearch] = useState('') const searchPressed = ()=>{ fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=oran&appid=16e195f24f8e11e20cf225c63314fb1f`) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>{ console.log(data) setWeather(data) }) } searchPressed(); console.log(weather); return (
